Explain: Given the provided information, the agent has already grasped the bacon. Therefore, the next steps involve moving to the stove, toggling it on, and cooking the bacon.
subtask: (3) Cook the bacon on the stove.
code:
def act(robot, env, camera):
    stove = registry(env, "stove_rgpphy_0")
    bacon = registry(env, "bacon_150")
    MoveBot(env, robot, stove, camera)
    donothing(env)
    toggle_on(robot, stove)
    donothing(env)
    cook(robot, bacon)
    donothing(env)
